control.visible: ![Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(TVShows) | Container.Content(Seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Control.IsVisible(53)]

control.control:
Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(clips)
!Container.Content(episodes) 3 30 395 50 center ListItem.Label Shadow false list1
!Container.Content(episodes) 1 30 395 50 center ListItem.Label Blue false list1
Container.Content(episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(mixedParents)) 3 30 395 center 50 $INFO[ListItem.Episode]. $INFO[ListItem.Label] Shadow false list1
Container.Content(episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(mixedParents)) 1 30 395 center 50 $INFO[ListItem.Episode]. $INFO[ListItem.Label] Blue false list1
Container.Content(episodes) + !IsEmpty(Container.Property(mixedParents)) 3 30 395 center 50 $INFO[ListItem.Label] Shadow false list1
Container.Content(episodes) + !IsEmpty(Container.Property(mixedParents)) 1 30 395 center 50 $INFO[ListItem.Label] Blue false list1
StringCompare(ListItem.Overlay,OverlayUnwatched.png) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)] 22 10 12 12 Badges/Unwatched.png
<---->
<--->
StringCompare(ListItem.Overlay,OverlayInProgress.png) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)] 22 10 12 12 Badges/InProgress.png

[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons)] + IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(ZeroEpisodeCount)) 16 450 36 24 Badges/UnwatchedCount.png Visible
